description: Graspeaser is a tool that uses large language models (LLMs) to simplify and explain content like videos, audio, text, URLs, and documents. Itâ€™s designed to help people with ADHD and dyslexia better understand information by breaking it down into easy-to-digest explanations. Whether you're learning something new or tackling complex topics, Graspeaser makes it easier to grasp and process.
